name: zk-wordle
description: Wordle game implemented using the Zero-Knowledge Proofs

scripts.compile: circom circuits/wordle.circom --r1cs --wasm --sym --c --output circuits/compiled && cd circuits && snarkjs zkey new compiled/wordle.r1cs powers-of-tau/powersOfTau28_hez_final_08.ptau compiled/wordle_0000.zkey
